types.html:
comme si (+ imperfect or pluperfect)

  1. as if; as though (as to suggest that)
    Il sortit par la porte et Roger put voir que son visage était pâle, comme s’il avait vu un fantôme.
    He went out the door and Roger could see that his face was white, as though he had seen a phantom.
